website_summaries.verdict: There is no better combination of raw stopping power and concealability with this inconspicuous and extra-sturdy flashlight and stun gun combo.
cons: Using the flashlight quickly drains the stun gun’s battery

customer_reviews.title: Very good for the price, works well.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my wife to take on walks. It's a decent flashlight and the taser works. Tried it through my leather jacket on my arm for a fraction of a second and it left welts. It would be crippling for longer than a few seconds through thin clothing. I like the button setup. Easy to switch from flashlight to taser without hand adjustment.
customer_reviews.author: M&A Mosier

customer_reviews.title: Love this!
customer_reviews.text: I bought 7 of these for friends and family and highly recommend it. I use mine every morning on my dog walk and keep it beside my bed for protection. While I haven't had to use it on a person , the people I bought it for used it and it worked great. They tried out the stun portion and it dropped the person quickly. I will keep on buying these for gifts!!
customer_reviews.author: tisa wheeler

customer_reviews.title: A MUST FOR COLLEGE GIRLS
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my daughter who is attending college. She was recently cornered by a male in the women's bathroom on campus. This product works...she tried it on two of her male friends who are have big guys....the zap knocked one to the ground. The only problem with this product is that the case you put it in lasted a week. We would like a replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I bought it because it looks like a little flashlight so an attacker would not suspect ...
customer_reviews.text: Wow this one really packs a punch. I bought it because it looks like a little flashlight so an attacker would not suspect it until it is too late. My wife says she feels much safer having to walk from employee parking all the way to the hospital every morning.
customer_reviews.author: randall oliverTop Contributor: Hydroponics

customer_reviews.title: Knocks em out
customer_reviews.text: This thing works great! I shocked my brother with it as soon as I opened it up and he didn't move for 20 minutes
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This item is absolutely phenomenal great buy for a great price I recommended it to ...
customer_reviews.text: This item is absolutely phenomenal great buy for a great price I recommended it to several friends and they have recently purchased the same thing it is awesome I highly recommend getting this for personal protection
customer_reviews.author: Ghost

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: So cute, I love it. I feel much safer. The flashlight is really bright and the taser is very loud. I would definitely would recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah M.

customer_reviews.title: it does not have a green/red charge light...troubling to not know if it's charged
customer_reviews.text: not worth the bother to return but the manufacturer told me it does not turn green when it is charged so you basically never know if it's charged properly and if I recall.. it said not to overcharge or it can damage and void warranty..they said to charge it a few hours every month to make sure..but no green light gives me no confidence really. I suppose you could guess about charge by looking at flashlight brightness or testing each time you go out but then it might down quickly..IDK...I just like seeing a green light turn on when I'm done charging... when I tested it the noise alone sounds intimidating so I think that's very cool
customer_reviews.author: Kayinsun

customer_reviews.title: As a flashlight it’s great! Stun gun not so much
customer_reviews.text: This works well as a flashlight, but after having it only a week, and being kept in the case, I tested according to instructions and one of the pieces came off! It is useless as a stun gun now. I wrote an email to ViperTek but am still waiting for a reply.
customer_reviews.author: Kim L. Medina

customer_reviews.title: Video test: Kicks like a mule - Stings, locks up muscles.
customer_reviews.text: Video test and demonstration: "Describe the feeling like a fine wine." This thing kicks like a mule. Excellent, excellent bang for your buck. It doubles as a surprisingly powerful flashlight too. Scary, crackly noise gets to you psychologically. It sounds like a firecracker. It locks up the muscles like a conventional Taser that you see on TV. The only downside compared to other self defense tools (i.e. fire@rms)(silly Amazon restrictions) is you have to be close to your opponent. A brazen criminal will push right past the shock, and subdue you if he is bigger. So don't completely rely on this to save your life. Learn actual self defense (not from a McDojo that teaches Hollywood moves. Go practical.)
customer_reviews.author: Beau Chevassus

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy this product
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited about this when I got it and the noise it makes is loud, but after 2 weeks the screws fell out and the top popped off. Then it just sort of fizzled out. I was very disappointed that it broke right away. I didn't do anything with it other than keep it in my purse. Do not buy this.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Makes a Statement- Good for the Price
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use; bright flashlight; loud, bright electrical arc that might make a would-be assailant think twice. Unfortunately, the ”holster” that came with it is unusable because the fastener on one side is only attached by a few frayed threads. Not worth the expense of returning it for that. UPDATE: Upon learning about the unusable case, seller sent a new one unsolicited! Excellent customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Cathy Levesque

customer_reviews.title: Recharging plug does not work.
customer_reviews.text: Recharging plug didn't work. Plug was not to US 120 v outlet standard. It was too thin, too small and did not make electrical contact with outlet. I replaced the plug, but if this is any indicationof the quality and reliability of this product, I will not be trusting my wife's safety with it. This is a growing concern with electronic products made in China. We have been disappointed with recent purchases.
customer_reviews.author: F B

customer_reviews.title: Battery Charge Unknown- Stun Feature Unreliable
customer_reviews.text: The manual states to charge once per month for 1-2 hours. After 2 weeks, the stun feature doesn't work anymore, assuming because the battery is too low for it. It seems like a great product, but if I can't count on the stun feature to work when I need it, it's just a flashlight. This product needs an indication on it to tell the user when the stun feature is unavailable due to battery (the flashlight works fine either way so that isn't an indication).
customer_reviews.author: kristysmash

customer_reviews.title: Great product and support
customer_reviews.text: I bought 5 of these. One for my wife and one for each daughter. They all loved them as just a regular flashlight. Then I showed them the special features. We are big fans of personal protection and these are a great addition. Just the sound alone is enough for most people to rethink bad behavior. I had them shipped to three different addresses. One shows it was delivered to my daughter who lives close to me but she did not receive it. I contacted the seller and the only question they had was where to send the replacement. Great product and price. Even better customer service.
customer_reviews.author: E. Prine

customer_reviews.title: Never been used, but makes me feel safer!!
customer_reviews.text: I like this product, it makes me feel a little bit more safe being a woman out alone at night, but after 2 months the taser part stopped working. It’s never actually been used on anyone, but I would suggest checking it every so often to make sure the taser still works so if you were in a bad situation you know you have a working product. At first I thought the taser broke, but realized I just needed to charge it again. 😂
customer_reviews.author: Whitney

customer_reviews.title: Works to scare aggressive dogs away
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because one of my neighbors always lets their dog run loose and it's very aggressive and will go after you. The dog has chased many people. I don't want to hurt the dog but I'm fearful of it hurting me or my dogs that are in my backyard (the dog tries to get in my backyard) or out front on a leash. So I have had a few run ins with the dog and used this in the air to scare it away and it backed up enough to give me time to get inside.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: The shock button is too easy to set off
customer_reviews.text: Works well. You have to be careful. I have accidentally bumped the shock button numerous times and scared myself. I was using the flashlight when I was on a ladder in the attic and almost fell off of the ladder. The shock button is too easy to set off.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: BEWARE!!! READ BELOW BEFORE BUYING!!
customer_reviews.text: I'd rate ZERO stars if I could. I bought THREE and after 2 WEEKS NONE OF THEM WORK And it's not just the light that doesn't work, the stun gun doesn't either. BEWARE!!!! Two of them malfunctioned and shocked my wife and I while we were just using the light we didn't even touch the stun button, and it wasn't switched into position to stun. DON'T BUY CHEAP STUN GUNS.... OR TRY IT AND LEARN THE HARD WAY!
customer_reviews.author: PatAndLaura

customer_reviews.title: Great product! Great price!
customer_reviews.text: Works perfectly! Of course I didn't "test" it on anyone, but it makes a mighty SNAP that startles the heck out of everyone. Flashlight is good and bright as well. Needless to say, the pink aluminum finish is attractive as well. I plan to use this on trips when I have to use rest area facilities at night. No one will think twice about a woman carrying a pink flashlight down the dark sidewalk. The price was great too. Recently I paid only 2 dollars less for a bright flashlight --without the SNAP!
customer_reviews.author: D. Johnston

customer_reviews.title: Charge Light
customer_reviews.text: Received my order yesterday and immediately plugged it in to get a full charge. This morning the charge light was still red. In the "questions" area someone mentioned light does not turn to green when item is fully charged yet instructions warn not to overcharge?? This is somewhat confusing regarding charging the item. A green light would have been nice. Other than the the item appears as described and I can't complain about the cost. Guess you get what you pay for. This item was suggested by my dog breeder as an attention-getting device for a headstrong puppy and a 1 sec. blast into the air does get everyone's attention and stops bad behavior. It is loud.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy

customer_reviews.title: Bam!
customer_reviews.text: I got this taser because a neighbor's dog charged into my house to attack my cat, and the neighbor has not been great with being responsible for their dog since. I have it by my door in case the dog tries it again because it was hard to get the dog off my cat by just grabbing her. This way I can zap the dog and get the dog away! I also take it with me on bike rides and hikes. The taser part is pretty loud and you can see it! Plus the flashlight is awesome. Holds a charge for a very long time. The safety feature ensures you can't accidentally set it off.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer L. Lopez

customer_reviews.title: Great for someone working in the gig economy
customer_reviews.text: This stun gun/flashlight ticks off every box for me. When I work I used to carry a knife with me but I knew I would probably never actually use it. With the wrist strap I can juggle all of the things to the door but still have some protection near my hand, not in a pocket. I feel that I will be able to effectively use this if I needed to. Trying to see houses/house numbers at night can be very difficult so the flashlight will also be awesome to have! I am very happy with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: spacekitty

customer_reviews.title: Great product for size and price!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my sister in law who walks to and from work alone during the day and at night. I have to say I was shocked at the voltage that comes out of this little thing. If she were to encounter any danger I believe this could do some damage. It's a plus that it also acts as a flashlight. She carries it on a regular basis and she loves it. I would definitely recommend to any woman looking for some added protection. I believe you will be impressed at the quality of this little flashlight. There is a separate charger for the taser part. I believe the flashlight itself holds batteries.
customer_reviews.author: Veronica

customer_reviews.title: SUPER INTIMIDATING
customer_reviews.text: This thing is terrifying. I tested it in the air and almost dropped it, the sparking was so loud. So, basically, exactly what you want in a stun gun. If someone pointed that at me, I'd start running. Nice and small, fits in my glove box no problem. Only problem is that the button cover on the flashlight part is loose and has a tendency to fall off, but you can still use it without (or glue it on better), and that's not what I bought it for anyway.
customer_reviews.author: Heather S

customer_reviews.title: If you need good protection NOW, look no further.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this last night. It arrived this morning. And I can't even explain how helpful it was that this has quick delivery. The person who was stalking me showed up and tried to confront me only a few hours later and this was INVALUABLE. I was able to incapacitate him for long enough to get behind locked doors. It really does work how you need it to. I don't know much about tasers, but this worked EXACTLY how I needed it to.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Angell

customer_reviews.title: Feel safer with this
customer_reviews.text: I wanted something for protection. This is great, as it is also a functioning flashlight!! It took a lot of asking until I found a volunteer to test it out tho.. on the arm, not much of a reaction or efficiency after 3 attempts. They were still smiling. I was them given the opportunity to try a more sensitive area. It brought them to their knees after only a second. They were unable to get up for almost a minute. Which is enough time to get away!!
customer_reviews.author: k.k.

customer_reviews.title: It’s excellent but just be careful if u have kids
customer_reviews.text: Excellent size , looks and feels just like a flashlight. U have to charge it for 12 hrs before u use it. I charged it a little bit and it worked but the next day I tried to show it off to a friend but it didn’t turn on , so I actually read the instructions and it said to charge 12 hrs. Just be careful because even tho I told my older kids that it was not to play with , my toddler (who gets into everything) including my purse , could find it and it’s really easy to switch to tazer mode and the thought of her getting hurt scares me lol.
customer_reviews.author: kori cas

customer_reviews.title: Didn't hold a charge for one week!!!
customer_reviews.text: I am returning this product as it doesn't hold the charge. I followed directions exactly as listed. Had it one week and went to show a friend how it worked and didn't even get a sputter out of it and light was very dim. Sure glad to find that out before I may have had to use it!!! I'm looking for another one and have seen that that brand has other models that have had the same problem.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Bradley

customer_reviews.title: Awesome, cute tazer!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome! This is a great product. Flashlight is bright, and tazer definitely will make its mark! I am in college, and found this to be a great product to invest in. 10/10 recommend. Also, the pink makes it very cute!
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey

customer_reviews.title: Plugs too small for wall outlets and extensions: could not charge
customer_reviews.text: Liked the idea but the electrical prongs are not made for USA wall or extension cord sockets. Haven’t been able to use it. Quality control missed on this one. I do not recommend. It is my first purchase of this kind so I was excited about learning to use it. I am returning with or without refund. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Wise Owl

customer_reviews.title: Worth the Price!
customer_reviews.text: I was pretty hesitant at a $13 taser, mainly was going to use it hopefully to deter someone with the sound. However I was definitely happy to see that it definitely works! Had a friend of mine willing to test it out and even with a long sleeve and a sweater he was down on the ground immediately. Even left a welt, and this was only for a split second of being tased. So I would definitely recommend this to anyone wanting something extra to help protect them!
customer_reviews.author: Cortney

customer_reviews.title: God's Gift
customer_reviews.text: Bought this originally for self protection. Never had to use it but found it useful in an unexpected way. I have dogs that commonly fight occasionally. Most annoying thing and it takes newspapers etc to break it up. I know that you never use this on an animal unless it's self protection but I took this out, fired it up in the air/not touching them and they heard the sound, instantly running seperate directions and laying down on their beds. This thing is like A Miracle on 31st Street. I no longer have the problem with my dog's. The sound alone makes them stop instantly. I'm older so this really is a blessing.
customer_reviews.author: Simon Hudson

customer_reviews.title: Serves a purpose until there’s an issue.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve bought 3 of these vipertek flashlight stun guns. They are a necessity for me walking my dog, given I have a neighbor dog that will attack us. But the last 2, the light bulb quit working. I went ahead and ordered another when the first one quit working. Now in less than 3 months the flashlight doesn’t work. It says lifetime warranty and I contacted the company. No response. I definitely will NOT Be purchasing vipertek products again because of their poor customer service.
customer_reviews.author: S. Musselman

customer_reviews.title: Looses charge even when not in use
customer_reviews.text: Not reliable. Completely looses charge without a warning. It happened twice, I had it charged up and when I go to randomly test it out, it's not working. I do not use flashlight for anything, so it's not like i used up a charge. I usually just throw it in the stroller whenever i go on a walk, but if I ever had to use the tazer, it's not realiable, because even though the light works, the tazer isn't and there is no way of knowing unless you are trying it out. Useless product. Save your money for something else.
customer_reviews.author: Kristinasv

customer_reviews.title: GREAT for Realtors
customer_reviews.text: my only suggestion is to 'zap" it a bunch of times before you ever need to use it. the sound is incredibly daunting and you don't want to scare yourself. I recently listed a brand new condo building. I didn't want it to look unsafe, but it was creepy being along in a 5 story building. It could ride along in my pocket, and as a flashlight as handy too!
customer_reviews.author: Annette Montgomery

customer_reviews.title: taking a stand
customer_reviews.text: I was nervous at first carrying the stun gun, but I need some type of protection while walking my dog. She's been attacked 3 different times. One neighbor lets his dogs run free even though animal control has warned him (that was 1st attack)....another neighbor has a Pitbull that runs out when someone opens the door & was the other 2 attacks! Hopefully I won't have to use it, but this ensures my dog will be safe. Glad I found your company...thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't hold a charge. Wish I hadn't bought three and gave away as gifts without trying it myself first.
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: Flimsy
customer_reviews.text: Ordered in October taser stopped working in January. Flashlight still works,but got it for the taser. Never been dropped,bumped or knocked..smh
customer_reviews.author: Heavydeacon

customer_reviews.title: Powerful!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is awesome! And it's very loud. I think the sound alone would scare people away. It does go off though in my purse sometimes and scare the crud outta me and those standing near by. lol. It was so strong that it kind of fried some of the threading around the case that they give you to keep it in. When I carry it I try to keep it on the very top of my purse so I won't accidentally press the little button that sets it off.
customer_reviews.author: dhawthorne

customer_reviews.title: Bummer stick
customer_reviews.text: Was so excited about this after a fellow bartender recommended it, but it went dead fairly fast (a couple of days) and the charger that was included is faulty and causes sparks as well as frying a socket.
customer_reviews.author: morgan strickland

customer_reviews.title: This thing sounds, looks and IS MEAN.  Great threat deterrent.
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my realtor wife for protection. She loves both the flashlight and the taser. Hope she never needs to yes it but, if someone made threatening moves toward her, I think the loud, angry, snarling, crackling sound of the taser going off would probably make them back off. If not, her pepper spray is a reasonable second response. ---- Update 12/21/19 I just ordered two more, for my Daughter and Granddaughter.
customer_reviews.author: HTDMike

customer_reviews.title: great......if it hadnt stopped working after one week
customer_reviews.text: The flashlight stopped working just after a week, and I didnt really even get a chance to USE it but once or twice. There seemed to be a short inside or something. The stun part seemed quite powerful and I think it wouldve been wonderful had I needed to use it for protection. The item is quite large, like a regular flashlight and I did like the size. I don't have the chance during this lockdown in LA to send the item back, so I guess its just my loss. I just got a dud unfortunaletly??
customer_reviews.author: pappy

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend especially for dog walkers.
customer_reviews.text: A substantial item to have when walking the dog. If dog on your leash of self being attacked simply let the sound of the jolt do its job. The biggest dog at 20' away will turn tail and run. Only downside it also scares your leashed dog, but beats being in local newspaper from a bad ending. Highly recommended to those with not so friendly dogs not controlled by their owners.
customer_reviews.author: RBH

customer_reviews.title: Nice!
customer_reviews.text: So I haven’t had to use this for real which is a good thing of course. But, it also means that I don’t know how good it works. Will say the light is super bright and it is easy to charge. The sound from the taser is SUPER LOUD. I touched the button once and my dog about jumped out of her skin. So the loud factor is there which might be all I really need anyway. I think it would scare anyone or anything coming close to me.
customer_reviews.author: Krista

customer_reviews.title: Stop! Go ahead, add to cart!
customer_reviews.text: Ok guy this is a great little inconspicuous stun gun flashlight combo for your money! This little joker packs a punch straight out the box but initially should be charged for 10-12 hours but only 1-2 hours a month after that. The unit altogether seems heavy & sturdy enough to wack a no-good doer across the skull leaving a noticeable lump(s) for later police identification. Also the flashlight is lightening bolt blinding! Wasnt expecting that one. All in all get this for your loved ones or yourself to feel a lot safer. I do.
customer_reviews.author: Ms. Smith

customer_reviews.title: This thing is so good, it scared me!
customer_reviews.text: What a fantastic product! Totally love this and so glad you make it, Vipertek. The instructions that come with it are well-written and easy to understand. Product works extremely well. This is a great tool for women to have for protection while they are out and about. Easy to carry, discreet, light weight, but extremely powerful. This is another tool in my small arsenal of self-defense tools. Women should give as much consideration to their day-to-day protection as they would in what they are having for dinner. I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: clare_bear

customer_reviews.title: seems strong
customer_reviews.text: ***4.14.2020 STOPPED WORKING. THE FLASHLIGHT WORKS, BUT THE "TASER" PART NO LONGER WORKS. I DON'T NEED ANOTHER FLASHLIGHT. I do monthly checks of my stun gun. I carry it everywhere since I was mugged. Does not spark anymore. This seems like a great tool to have for your protection. I had my boyfriend compare it to his professional one and he stated this was a solid taser. The fact that it is pink and can kick a** is a bonus.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It works for walking
customer_reviews.text: Our area has a problem of free-roaming dogs so on the advice of a few friends I invested in a stun gun. This one isn't as robust as the one a friend has, and when I first tried it, but I've used it twice to successfully discourage dogs from approaching too closely. I like that it is small enough to tuck in a pocket.
customer_reviews.author: C H

customer_reviews.title: Powerful, but no safety!
customer_reviews.text: It's so cute and intimidating! Even the sound alone is enough to ward off enemies! Although I have not had to use it, I showed it to an MP (military police) he said it sounded as fierce as the military grade taser! I have no doubt that this will do the job. Biggest feat is that there isn't a LATCH on the toggle switch! It must stay in the holster in order to HOPE you dont accidentally turn this joker on....
customer_reviews.author: Aray

customer_reviews.title: I love this thing!
customer_reviews.text: Always out in the woods in the dark and this little thing makes me feel much safer. We have come too close to Coyotes before on our predawn deep woods adventures. I feel safer knowing I have some form of protection. Plus, it's an extra light in the event that it is needed. Feels heavy duty and it was pretty inexpensive. Great value of the $$ and this thing makes my family jump when I test it. ZAP! It's scary sounding.
customer_reviews.author: Amity Howard

customer_reviews.title: Love It!!
customer_reviews.text: Everything I expected to be. I love love love the bright pink color and the fact that this tactical weapon doubles as a flashlight. I plan to carry in my purse, but just so you know it’s not very light... so ladies it will add weight to your probably already heavy purses. Also, it’s very loud; I scared my poor doggie out of his sleep when I was testing it, and he was freaked out for a while after. Other than that, I think it will get the job done should you ever need to use it.
customer_reviews.author: Beautiful Soul

customer_reviews.title: Practical and easy to carry
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my niece who attends college. She went crazy over it! She told me it was her favorite Christmas gift this year and would be carrying it with her. The flashlight is very bright and the stun mechanism simple to use. It's also very loud which in itself might be a deterrent to any potential predators. Please note, this is not a toy or novelty item. We couldn't get anyone in the family to volunteer to get stunned so I can't be sure of the power but it sounds bad! Good quality, too.
customer_reviews.author: siena21

customer_reviews.title: Sounds scarry
customer_reviews.text: Finally! I don't have to carry pepper spray in one hand and flashlight in the other. It would be nice if I don't have to get close to the criminal that's been torturing me for years. I would buy one that throws something or launches bear spay twenty feet cause thats what the antoginizer deserves. If you wait for help, you will end up locked up yourself and committed. We need to take back America and not let people get so desperate. VOTE FOR POOR PEOPLE AND VALUES
customer_reviews.author: Linda Robinson

customer_reviews.title: Excellent light and tazer!
customer_reviews.text: This is a must have for any woman. I need a light while I work, and I'm in some bad areas.... the light works great, and there is a safety so you don't shock yourself. The battery lasts several days. The holster is not very good, it broke after the first day, but other than that, I have no complaints. I would strongly suggest this item to anyone who needs a little extra protection.
customer_reviews.author: C.Ulloa

customer_reviews.title: Safety first!
customer_reviews.text: I have recommended this to so many people. Safety is important and this is a discreet and functional way to help ensure mine. As a Realtor I take it to Open Houses and when meeting new clients, I also take it when walking my dogs. The fact that it doubles as a flashlight is an added bonus. I just charge it up once per month to ensure it's ready to go. So happy to have it!
customer_reviews.author: crazylady80126

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: It's pink and cute, but it actually works! The taser part is SUPER loud and would scare anyone away and the flashlight part is VERY bright. Almost a blue light. My husband bought this for my to take my late night walks with our dog. I will definitely feel safer holding this and would totally "test" the taser to scare anyone away. And you can't beat the price!
customer_reviews.author: Madeline Bramer

customer_reviews.title: Good buy for the price.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this stun gun because I liked the flashlight feature and the stun button being located on the opposite side of the flashlight control. I agree with other reviewers that the stun gun is loud and bright and that the recharging cord is far too short. It only measures 9 1/2 inches. I intend to carry the gun when walking my small dog as a protection against unfriendly dogs. Even though I bought this in December and didn't have expedited shipping I received it in excellent time. This is a good buy for the price. Gave it only 4 stars due to the inconvenience of the very short cord which would not prevent me from purchasing it again.
customer_reviews.author: Renee

customer_reviews.title: Easy to operate
customer_reviews.text: It seems to work really well. Easy to operate. I hope I won't have to use on anyone, but if it comes to that, I am happy I have this since I work nights sometimes delivering food. Came right out of package working. I am just afraid I would shock myself, but hasn't happened yet and praying it doesn't. Light is great and nice and bright. Would recommend to a friend or family member. Thanks!!
customer_reviews.author: Jomo

customer_reviews.title: Easy to Use, Makes Me Feel Safe
customer_reviews.text: I was concerned that carrying something like this would be dangerous, but you have to be pretty intentional about how you use it in order to make it work, so it's pretty safe in that regard. I like how easy it is to use. And the flashlight on this thing isn't bad; it's pretty powerful. Overall, I feel like this is a well-made product, makes me feel more secure, and I feel confident having it. I hope I don't have to use it, but I feel that if I do have to, I'll be able to without hesitation.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney Herz

customer_reviews.title: Cost & good quality
customer_reviews.text: Only had this flashlight/taser 2 months & the light just flashes off & on isn't working anymore that sucks. I need a good flashlight for work. I have to buy a new one. I will not be buying anything from Amazon. Why is Amazon is raising prices because of the pandemic that is going on in the world!!! That should be against the law for any company to raise their prices because people are in need Amazon sucks😤🤬🤬🤬👎👎
customer_reviews.author: Irma Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: I bought 3 of these and love them. I gave on to a friend since ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought 3 of these and love them . I gave on to a friend since she likes to run. It's light weight and it doesn't get in the way. I gave one to my puppy sitter since she walks her late evening, and kept one for myself. My special friend is in law enforcements and loves that I have it. People never expect it to be more than a flash light and I love that. Perfect if you young ladies in college or who work late at light.
customer_reviews.author: Cocokises

customer_reviews.title: Packs a punch!
customer_reviews.text: This little taser packs a punch!! The reason I only gave 3 stars is because the lid on the end of the battery compartment is broken off and won’t fit back on. Other than that, I carry it with me, wherever I go. Maybe I got a faulty product. Who knows? I still feel safer carrying it with me. It’s easy to use. You just push the button all the way to the forward position and then push the red button to deliver a shock. Hopefully I’ll never had to use it on a person but, if I do, it should stop them in their tracks.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany😍

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended
customer_reviews.text: Arrived quickly, well packed in a very nice elegant looking, thick cardboard , black box suitable for gifting. Came aleady charged, and working right out of the box. Pink is just as shown, a bright neon metallic pink. Ot is thick and heavy, substantial, not a toy. Cord works to recharge the light and gun. On/ off / stun switch is marked and easy to understand and use. I am very pleased ths far, as of a week of use.
customer_reviews.author: pen💮

customer_reviews.title: Love it so much I bought another!!
customer_reviews.text: I initially bought this to take when walking my dogs. If another dog is acting aggressive I only have to push the button to make the zapping sound and it gets there attention, backs them down without anyone noticing. Comes w charger. It's very light weight, stays charged a long time, and holds up. I bought another for by my bedside.
customer_reviews.author: Jamesina Payton

customer_reviews.title: Zapper stopped working after 2 weeks
customer_reviews.text: Bought 2, both zappers stopped working. First one after a few months,second one after a few weeks. Flashlight still works though!
customer_reviews.author: MarKay

customer_reviews.title: Great protection for my wife!!!
customer_reviews.text: So far so good, I purchased this for my wife to replace some older lipstick version of a stun gun because they wouldn't hold a charge any longer. I like the flashlight style more and hoping the batteries in this style/model last longer than the lipstick version did. My wife loves the color (pink) and how easy to use compared again to the lipstick version where you would first have to remove a lid then zap the #$@@!!! out of the perp. This is just grab and zap!!! Nice how it has the flashlight feature as well.
customer_reviews.author: Noble1

customer_reviews.title: Great device!
customer_reviews.text: This is a little heavier than I expected, but, it is a great flashlight on top of a security weapon for me when Im out walking my dogs at night. I don't know how well this will work, if I have to use it on someone..however, i tested it for a second and from the sounds of it, it would scare me away! lol. Great price for this! Truly a good product.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly P.

customer_reviews.title: This flashlight concealing Zapper is great!
customer_reviews.text: I love that this is both a bright LED flashlight and a taser! It's great for walking the dog outside at night and fearing running into a coyote! But luckily have not had to use it on one. Also, I keep it on my night stand at night for added security because it is so unassuming. It comes with a charging cord and a durable cover which carefully covers the taser part and allows the flashlight to be carried on a belt or purse. Everyone needs a flashlight in the home- but this thing gives me the added peace of mind as a defensive tool.
customer_reviews.author: Glinny

customer_reviews.title: Stay In Yo Lane!...or else!
customer_reviews.text: The only thing is, it's a little too easy for taser part to turn on; so when just using the flashlight I've accidentally turned it on and scared the holy sh!t outta myself!....a couple of times now...lol. So, a little worried about it turning in while in my purse, even with the little cover on it. May buy a different holder. Overall, great buy! 4.9999 Stars.
customer_reviews.author: Kaleafornia Hairomatherapy

customer_reviews.title: Flashlight stopped working after just one month
customer_reviews.text: The flash light stopped working after one month . I really wanted the flashlight part of this stun gun so I’m bummed. Also, there is not an ‘armed’ indicator so it’s confusing if it’s armed (ready to stun) or off- there other stun guns have a red light to indicate its armed. I found this out the hard way and stunned myself! Made me drop everything I was carrying- very unpleasant sensation!
customer_reviews.author: Kevin F Holbrook

customer_reviews.title: Innocent looking, but should be a powerful deterrent!
customer_reviews.text: It looks like a pretty pink flashlight, and it works for that too. I read the reviews about the sound it makes, and it really is LOUD. My dog bolted from the room when I set off the zapper. Someone would have to be really intent on causing trouble to keep going after hearing that sound. I imagine it should send most hostile animals running too. I haven't tested the effectiveness of the stun function, but sounds like it will hurt... a lot.
customer_reviews.author: William T. Simpson

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Defense for the Price
customer_reviews.text: Nice bright light, knocked myself senseless on first use. I am only kidding! The three levels of safety (rear button, selector button and activator button) insure you don't accidently discharge the stun gun. I haven't had to use the stun gun and hope I never do, but it is an excellent non-lethal option for self defense.
customer_reviews.author: thomas j. stewart

customer_reviews.title: Flashlight case broke fast...
customer_reviews.text: The flashlight is too heavy for the case that it comes with. Broke on day 1. Haven't been able to find stronger case for flashlight since. Had bought 3 of them. ALL ARE USELESS SELF-DEFENSE DEVICES WITHOUT PROPER CASES. DON'T WASTE YOUR MONEY. Anybody in need of a paperweight? I got 3 to sell?
customer_reviews.author: ric

customer_reviews.title: It did nothing...
customer_reviews.text: So my best friends boyfriend, just used it on himself, multiple times and it did nothing to him. This was a let down, I have been walking out of work at 4 am and thinking I was well protected. This is scary to think of.
customer_reviews.author: Cee Cee Fog

customer_reviews.title: Not working.
customer_reviews.text: For some add reason it just stopped working. Neither the taser or flashlight functions work anymore. I ordered two of these VIPERTEK VTS-T03. Could Vipertek help out with this?
customer_reviews.author: felipe arreola

customer_reviews.title: Do not purchase. CHEAPLY made and worthles
customer_reviews.text: This flashlight is very poorly constructed. It came apart the first time I used it and it will not screw back together.
customer_reviews.author: P. Moody

customer_reviews.title: I’m pleased-Great value!
customer_reviews.text: Thankfully I have not had to use this item, but the VIPERTEK VTS-T03 - Aluminum Series 53 Billion Heavy Duty Stun Gun - Rechargeable with LED Tactical Flashlight (Pink ) Came very quickly as promised and is exactly as described. Instructions are quite simple. I tested it with just a quick one second zap and it put off quite a charge! I carry it in my purse and I believe it would serve as a great self-defense tool if I were to ever need it! I’m happy with the purchase and likely to purchase this in the future as a gift or get a back up one for myself.
customer_reviews.author: Lorena Harding

customer_reviews.title: Discreet protection
customer_reviews.text: I was driving for lyft and uber for a while and as a single woman I was told that I needed something to protect myself just in case so I ordered this and kept it in my purse. I completely forgot I had it until I went to divorce court and had to have my back inspected! It is light weight and easy to use. I don't know how great the shock is because I have not used that part, but it makes for a great flash light!!
customer_reviews.author: Joanna

customer_reviews.title: Wow did this scare me!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to see what this thing could do but boy was I not prepared for how loud the sound would be when the stun gun is activated! I wish someone was taking a video of me, it would have been a great laugh!!! Just the sound of this thing would be a deterrent, I would hate to see what would happen to anyone who comes in contact with the business end of this thing!!
customer_reviews.author: Ginger

customer_reviews.title: Flashlight Taser Combo
customer_reviews.text: Haven't had to use the taser, fortunately - but I loved the price-point, and quality of the VTS-TO3 by #Vipertek and the added comfortability this tool has provided me. The flashlight is so powerful you can see its bright beam streaming in the dark - and if accidently shown into eyes, heed my warning of momentary blindness, the lightbeam alone can stun a person! Of course the noise the taser makes can scare people too!
customer_reviews.author: AceMonroe

customer_reviews.title: A must have!
customer_reviews.text: I found this on Tik Tok and had to purchase it. It is great for when you're taking walks or hiking at night. You can use as an actual flashlight. And so it's already in your hand in case someone jumps at you. Comes with instructions Which I found really helpful. And the flashlight is surprisingly bright.
customer_reviews.author: christian Gingrich

customer_reviews.title: Bad people look out.
customer_reviews.text: This flashlight by Vipertex price-wise is a great deal. I don't know how effective it is because I've always been afraid to test it out on myself. But my wife stuck her hand down in her pocketbook and accidentally touch the flashlight and didn't know that it was on and shocked herself. She said it really works well. Matter of fact it only touched a finger. No I didn't turn it on.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Thank you
customer_reviews.text: It's as expected. I haven't had to use it yet, nor have I used it on myself, but it does provide peace of mind knowing I have this in my purse. The light stopped working on it a while back (had it for 8 months) but the taser part still works. I will purchase again when mine finally poops out.
customer_reviews.author: William

customer_reviews.title: Light weight and easy to carry
customer_reviews.text: I actually bought this after a conversation with my vet. Just the brief buzz noise stops the neighbor's annoying dog from jumping on my fence and freaking my dog out. Now, I'm thinking I will be carrying it whenever I go out or walk my dog. I would even like to take it on my Panama Canal cruise, but am wondering about getting it through security. The only thing I would like better about it would be if the charging light could indicate a difference between charging and charged!
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: Awesome purchase. Lasted 2 years.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this way back in 2017 and still have it to this day. I rarely charged it. It lasted till October 2019 and this is after the charger had been lost for months. Well this past month I've dropped it a lot so now the flashlight still works but the power button gets stuck so the stun part died. It lasted though. Had I not lost the charger and dropped it I wouldn't have had to buy another one. But I support and recommend this company. I even still have the holder it comes with.
customer_reviews.author: Nisha

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t have a lasting battery
customer_reviews.text: While it’s noisy it only works about half of the time the charge seems to last only a few hours which I do not like I need one that lasts at least a full day so I can charge it at the end of the night. Or sometimes it works at first and then stops working and then work again and then not work I don’t know if I just got a faulty one but I am going to return and order a different type
customer_reviews.author: colleen day

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: I have bought 2 of these. Neither of them lasted very long. I thought maybe the first one was just defective, but you hit the button and it would shock you. I think these look cool, but don't actually do the job when you need to use them. After a few months they both also stopped charging.
customer_reviews.author: Dan Hefta

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't last more than 2 months
customer_reviews.text: First few weeks works great. But after that it is useless. I bought my first Vipertek in October. The flashlight stopped working in November. I couldn't return it at the time and I loved that so much that I bought another one. But after 3 months the stun gun stopped working. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Klara Barta

customer_reviews.title: Good Product
customer_reviews.text: Great product for the price. Taser is loud, which I like as it's a hell of a deterrent on it's own. I ordered 3, one for home, my purse, and one for my mom. Hopefully I never need to use it, but I'm glad to have it just in case. They also arrive charged which I liked. The light is really bright on the flashlight portion as well.
customer_reviews.author: THill

customer_reviews.title: I was so excited!
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited to get this product for my runs just to finish charging it up and see it doesn’t work. I even had read the instructions saying don’t discharge in air. When I selected return it asked why but no one ever reached out so I guess even if it was a defect they don’t help you
customer_reviews.author: natasha

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight and easy to carry
customer_reviews.text: Lightweight and easy to carry. Thank goodness I have not had to use this yet. I bought this for when we walk our dogs. A few weeks a go we had a dog come and attack our dogs and I got bit. We had nothing to help us get the dog to go away and no amount of yelling helped, we were helpless until It ran away on its own. So I bought this and pepper spray to help. Plus it'll be great to have when we walk without our dogs.
customer_reviews.author: Aileen Schulz

customer_reviews.title: Zapped
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome flashlight/stun gun. I use it when I walk my dog at night, and can do so without any worries now. I haven't had to use it on anyone, but the flashlight is nice and bright. I priced these at local flea markets, and this is the best deal I have found. Thanks for such a great quality product.
customer_reviews.author: nuisance

customer_reviews.title: Works well, test with caution
customer_reviews.text: This item definitely makes me feel protected. After a couple of test shocks in the air, I knew I'd be able to use this easily and it would work on contact. It is also a really good flashlight! The only concern I have is that, it's so easy to use, that you have to be careful it doesn't go off. I felt like there should have been more of a safety function to prevent accidents.
customer_reviews.author: Maribelle F.

customer_reviews.title: where are these ratings coming from!
customer_reviews.text: I bought two and both stopped working within a month! then they sent me two more which stopped working. don't waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Good for a month, you get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: Updated review, these flashlights/taser combos are cute and work great the first month or so then become useless both in flashlight and taser function (dim and no electric shocks). Just an honest review, I've had it at least 6 months it's now useless and it's a replacement, as in, the first one also failed but faster.
customer_reviews.author: Norma

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Tool at an excellent price!
customer_reviews.text: My wife feels safe with this protector while walking our small dog in an area that has a few big dogs wandering around. It looks like a simple ladies flashlight ... but it can pack a fearsome crackle to scare any potential attacker. Well made and good looking!
customer_reviews.author: Russ SANBORN

customer_reviews.title: Sounds scary af
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this as protection while I’m driving for Lyft. Looks and functions as a flashlight so it is inconspicuous. Luckily I have not had to use this stun gun yet but, I’ve activated it and it sounds terrifying. I believe the loud zapping noise it emits would be enough to deter potential harm. The flashlight is very bright and the construction of the body is sturdy. Could easily be used as blunt force object if needed.
customer_reviews.author: Gabba

customer_reviews.title: Button not secure
customer_reviews.text: I like it and I don’t like it’s Great size good and compact-just as I want it. However the button is easily depressed with cover/sleeve. I will either return it, buy a different type or rig a lil something to prevent it from going off in my vest/ carrier
customer_reviews.author: Pam Pamm512

customer_reviews.title: OUTSTANDING!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent value for the money! Very well made and everything about it is EASY! I purchased 4 of these - 2 for my daughter (1 for her to keep in her car/1 for her to keep on her) and 2 for me for the same reasons. Have recommended them to ALOT of people!
customer_reviews.author: P. Falbo

product_meta.title: VIPERTEK VTS-T03 - Aluminum Series 53 Billion Heavy Duty Stun Gun - Rechargeable with LED Tactical Flashlight, Pink
product_meta.description: The VIPERTEK VTS-T03 stun gun really packs a punch! Just test firing this unit into the air is often enough to stop an attacker. As the bright electric current pulsates between the test prongs and creates an intimidating electrical sound, an attacker with any sense at all will be stopped in his tracks. If the sight and sound doesn't stop him, a jolt from this stun gun certainly will bring an attacker down! When an attacker is touched by the stun gun it will disrupt the message the brain sends to the voluntary muscles. Simply touching an attacker will deliver a high voltage shock causing loss of balance and muscle control, confusion, and disorientation bringing him to his knees and making him incapable of further aggressive activity. Due to restrictions in some states, county and city laws we do not ship to the following locations: Hawaii, Massachusetts, Michigan, Connecticut, New Jersey, Illinois, New York, Rhode Island, Wisconsin, District of Columbia, Annapolis, MD, Baltimore, MD, Chicago, IL, Philadelphia, PA, Baltimore County, MD, Crawford County, IA. VIPERTEK is a registered US trademark.
feature_bullets: Heavy Duty Stun Gun with 350 Lumen Tactical Flashlight
Type III aircraft grade aluminum alloy body with anti-roll design; 100,000-hour bulb
Internal Rechargeable Battery - No expensive batteries to buy. Convenient Size: 6.75"

Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
